articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Party
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Party
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of his birthday.
					 Riyad Shehada, charge d' affaires a.i. of the Palestinian embassy here,    conveyed the floral basket to an official concerned on Friday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the military attaches corps here on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were conveyed to an official concerned by Miguel Angel Gala Valiente, military attache of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, on Feb. 13.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il from Japanese Organizations and Figures
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il from Japanese Organizations and Figures
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was respectively presented with floral baskets by the Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women, the Miyagi Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association, Noboru Kameda, representative of the Society of the Japan-Korea Culture, and Nada Takashi, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, on Friday on the occasion of his birthday.

articles.title: Gifts and Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gifts and Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts and floral baskets by the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia, Hassan Turkmani, minister of Defence who is deputy commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Syria, and Harpal Brar, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist).
					 They were handed to officials concerned of the DPRK by the organization and figures of the relevant countries on Feb. 1 and 5.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Receives Floral Baskets from Chinese
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Receives Floral Baskets from Chinese
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with floral baskets by the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, and the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, on Friday on the occasion of his birthday.
					 Written on the ribbons of the floral baskets were letters: "We wholeheartedly wish the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il good health" and "We warmly congratulate the great leader of the Korean people General Kim Jong Il on your birthday and wholeheartedly wish you good health!."

articles.title: Ministry of People's Armed Forces Gives Reception
articles.content:
Ministry of People's Armed Forces Gives Reception
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces gave a reception in honor of the military attaches corps here on Friday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Present there on invitation were members of the corps.
					
					On hand were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and generals and officers of the Korean People's Army.
					
					Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition was opened to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 On display in the exhibition hall are at least 200 photos showing the Songun revolutionary feats performed by Kim Jong Il while traveling a long journey of patriotic devotion last year as a whole and the revolutionary stamina of the Korean people advancing, full of confidence, toward the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Among them are photographs "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il looks round the Kanggye Post Office, a revolutionary site," "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il provides field guidance to the Chollima Steel Complex to kindle the torch of a new great revolutionary surge," "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il gives on-the-spot guidance to the Central Zoo rebuilt on an expansion basis," which tell about the noble traits and immortal feats of Kim Jong Il who is creating an epic of devotion for the country and the people while making legendary forced march to lead the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 "Steel production goes up at the modern UHP electric arc furnace," "Unhung-ri, Thaechon County, turned into a socialist land of blessing" and other photos show the heroic efforts and proud achievements of the Korean people faithful to the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 There are also photos showing the ardent reverence of the world progressive people for the peerlessly great person and the steadfast will for national reunification of the Koreans who have turned out in the drive to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration under the banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 A ceremony of opening the exhibition took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday.
					
					 Minister of Culture Kang Nung Su made an opening address there.

articles.title: Art Performance of Workers Given to Celebrate February Holiday
articles.content:
Art Performance of Workers Given to Celebrate February Holiday
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The workers' art squad of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea gave an art performance at the Central Hall of Workers on Feb. 12 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Put on the stage of performance were such colorful numbers as male solo "Listen to the Then Voices of Emotion," dialogic poem "Torch of Kangson," serial songs "Thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun Politics," mixed duet "The Blue Sky over My Country," female solo "Song of Front Rankers in Chollima Movement" and male chorus "Let's Dash Forward to Build a Great Prosperous and Powerful Nation."
					
					 The performers highly sang of the great delight and deep emotion to which the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and other Korean people gave rein, heralding the birth of Kim Jong Il as the bright star of Mt. Paektu. And they highly praised the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il who raised the dignity and might of Songun Korea to the highest level with his distinguished political ability, prodigious grit and brilliant wisdom.
					
					 They also represented well the revolutionary enthusiasm and stamina of the workers and other people of the DPRK determined to proudly build a thriving socialist nation by effecting great innovations and leap forward unprecedented in the history of the country through the grand march of Chollima in response to the call of the Party.
					
					 The performance was appreciated by Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jung Rin and others.

articles.title: Palestinian Charge d'Affaires a.i. Gives Reception
articles.content:
Palestinian Charge d'Affaires a.i. Gives Reception 
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Riyad Shehada, charge d' affaires a.i. of the Palestinian embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Thursday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Palestinian embassy were on hand.
					
					 Riyad Shehada in his speech at the reception said that Kim Jong Il has defended the gains of the revolution, shattering the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK, and turned it into an impregnable bulwark by pursuing his unique Songun politics.
					
					 Referring to the fact that Kim Jong Il kindled the torch of a new great revolutionary surge to bring about a historic turn on all fronts for building a thriving nation, he expressed the belief that the Korean people closely united around Kim Jong Il would open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun in his reply noted that the birth of Kim Jong Il as a bright star of Mt. Paektu was the greatest fortune of the Korean people and a historic event of the nation as it guaranteed the eternal prosperity of the country and the inheritance and accomplishment of the Juche revolutionary cause.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK government to boost the relations of friendship between the DPRK and Palestine forged by President Kim Il Sung together with President Yasser Arafat, he said, adding that the DPRK government would send invariable support to the just cause of the Palestinian people to regain their legitimate national rights.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in China
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The China Association for International Friendly Contact and the Beijing Association for International Friendly Contact cosponsored a friendly meeting and a reception in Beijing on Feb. 11 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending the events were personages of various strata, including officials of the above-mentioned associations, and families of those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 The ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing were present on invitation.
					
					 Speeches were made at the friendly meeting.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the said China association offered warm congratulations to the Korean people who made signal successes in all fields of the revolution and construction under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il to significantly greet the 60th founding anniversary of the DPRK last year and wished them greater victories in their dynamic drive to attain the goal of opening the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation by bringing about a new great revolutionary surge this year.
					
					 Noting that the China-DPRK friendship has demonstrated its strong vitality, weathering out the trials of the complicated international situation, he said: We will hold dearer the precious asset provided by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries and make greater contribution to bringing the flower of the long-standing Sino-DPRK friendship into fuller bloom together with the Korean comrades.
					
					Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, noted that the army and people of the DPRK are working hard to bring about a new great revolutionary surge on all fronts of socialist construction under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people hope that the Chinese people would make greater strides to glorify the 60th founding anniversary of the People's Republic of China, he said, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and China would grow stronger under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries and by joint efforts of both sides in the "year of DPRK-China friendship."
					
					 The participants in the meeting sang songs of the two countries together, deepening friendship.

articles.title: February Holiday of DPRK Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
February Holiday of DPRK Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Moscow on Feb. 10 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					On display in the venue of the meeting were works of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and photos showing their undying feats.
					
					 It was attended by officials of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and the Voice of Russia and figures of different circles and other people. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Vorontsov, first vice-chairman of the above-said Russian association, said that Kim Jong Il has fully demonstrated his extraordinary caliber as an outstanding thinker and theoretician and a leader of varied accomplishments, leading the Workers' Party of Korea and people for several decades.
					
					 He referred to the fact that under his wise leadership the Korean people have achieved great successes in their efforts to develop national economy and improve the standard of people's living and in the stand-off with the U.S. over the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Veredin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, noted that the greatest of the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il is that he developed the Songun idea in depth and trained the Korean People's Army as a powerful revolutionary vanguard unit.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Il successfully accomplished the cause of perpetuating the memory of President Kim Il Sung and has confidently carried forward the ideas and theories expounded by the President, he wished the Korean people greater success in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised in Various Countries
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in France, round-table talks in the Czech Republic and a lecture in Mongolia on February 4 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, at the seminar said that Kim Jong Il is a genuine leader of the people who devotes his all only to prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the DPRK as it is led by Kim Jong Il, a seasoned statesman possessed of military and literary accomplishments, he stressed.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party at the round-table talks noted that Kim Jong Il has performed immortal exploits in the efforts for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, true to the last instructions for national reunification of Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 He said that the Czechoslovak Communist Party expresses full support to the Korean people in their efforts to defend socialism and reunify the country.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar held in France.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Greatest Leader of Present Era
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Greatest Leader of Present Era
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Korean people and the world progressives are lauding Kim Jong Il as the greatest leader of the present era who is demonstrating the dignity and the national power of the socialist Korea all over the world and is guiding the cause of independence against imperialism to the victory.
					 He proclaimed the immortal Juche idea as the guideline of our era long ago and put forth the theories on all realms of the revolution and construction and methods of leadership over masses, thus laying a solid foundation for the victory of the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.
					
					 He formulated the Songun principle with President Kim Il Sung's idea of giving priority to arms as the guideline and established the Songun politics as the main mode of the socialist politics, thus opening up a new phase for the development of the progressive ideas of the mankind.
					
					 Under his energetic guidance the Workers' Party of Korea has been strengthened and developed into the Juche-typed revolutionary one which is firmly carrying forward the lineage of Mt. Paektu and the DPRK consolidated as a powerful socialist country with the result that a model of the times has been created in the efforts for accomplishing the people's cause of independence.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who ushered in a new age of the Juche-oriented revolution with his great Songun revolutionary leadership, saw to it that the army building and activities have been undertaken strictly in accordance with the requirements of the Juche idea. He has thus developed the People's Army into an invincible revolutionary strong army and turned the DPRK into a country with world-class military strength.
					
					 He has developed in depth the tradition of unity established in Mt. Paektu to strengthen the revolutionary rank into an invincible one closely united around the leader on the basis of comradeship and rallied broad sections of masses around the Party to cement the internal force of the Korean revolution in every way.
					
					 The Korean people have smashed the desperate hostile moves of the U.S.-led imperialist reactionary forces against the DPRK at every step and wrought a historical miracle in the decisive battle for defending the country. This is the greatest victory won by the Songun revolutionary strategy of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He unfolded a far-reaching plan for building a great, prosperous and powerful nation with the iron faith and unbreakable will, set forth a unique line on economic construction in the Songun era and led the whole country to follow the revolutionary soldier spirit of the People's Army. In this way he has wisely led the people so that they have created new miracles and innovations on all fronts of the socialist construction.
					
					 Under the tested and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il, a politician rare to be seen, the socialist Korea with the strongest political and military forces will shine more brilliantly and Korean people's aspiration after a rich and strong country will be attained without fail.

articles.title: Congratulations to Bangladeshi President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Bangladeshi President
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Zillur Rahman on his election as president of Bangladesh.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, Kim in the message heartily wished the president great success in his noble work for stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Hit for Blocking Inter-Korean Exchange of News Items
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Hit for Blocking Inter-Korean Exchange of News Items 
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Recently the "Ministry of Unification" of south Korea took an action to totally block the exchange of news items with the DPRK proposed by the Press Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration under the pretext of what it called "security."
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued information bulletin No. 945 on Friday denouncing the action.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The Press Panel of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the Press Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration formally agreed to exchange each other's news items, prompted by the noble desire to promote the understanding between the north and the south and achieve as early as possible reconciliation, cooperation and reunification last year.
					
					 There is no ground whatsoever to incriminate this as it is quite natural to do so in the light of the trend of national history toward independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the banner of "By our nation itself" and the growing desire of the fellow countrymen for reunification.
					
					 This notwithstanding, the south Korean authorities took a fascist action to disallow the exchange of news items with the north under the pretext of what they called "security" and "concern." This is nothing but an anti-reunification action as it was prompted by their sinister attempt to quell the desire of the south Korean people to achieve reunification through alliance with the north, incite the hostility toward fellow countrymen and bring the inter-Korean relations to a total severance.
					
					 By "concern" the Lee Myung Bak group means that voices of the people in the north ardently desiring national reconciliation, unity and independent reunification are made known to the south Korean people and by "security" it means its intention to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and reinforce the legal and institutional mechanisms and the fascist ruling system to block reunification.
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times, stop blocking the exchange of news items between the media organizations in the north and the south and immediately drop its anti-DPRK confrontational policy.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Nonsensical Remarks Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Nonsensical Remarks Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) --The Lee Myung Bak group is foolishly behaving, talking nonsense that "a statement issued by the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea recently is no more than a message urging a switchover in its policy towards the north" and "the south-north basic agreement cannot be scrapped because of a statement."
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This is intolerable as it is a mockery and challenge to the Korean people, their hearts burning with bitter resentment at the group of traitors who turned their backs on the nation and a crafty artifice to play down the contents of the statement at any cost.
					
					 The CPRK's statement issued in view of the present inter-Korean relations and the prevailing grave situation represented an official stand of the DPRK government. The DPRK issued such statement with legal validity entirely because of the Lee group's vicious moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 It is the stark reality that all the agreements adopted between the north and the south in the past have been reduced to dead documents after they were proved to be defunct due to the moves of the group of traitors to totally negate the inter-Korean relations and bring them to collapse. 
					
					 Had the group responded even a bit to the DPRK's sincere efforts to respect and implement the north-south agreements, the inter-Korean relations would neither have found themselves in the present worst crisis nor a hair-trigger situation would have prevailed on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The CPRK's statement is the DPRK's strong message and solemn declaration aimed at coping with the grave situation created by the Lee group. This, at the same time, reflected the aspiration and will of all the compatriots who love the country and the nation. The Lee group is stupid enough to play a poor trick for misrepresenting the statement of weighty importance and playing down its significance.
					
					The CPRK's statement objectively reflected the deplorable reality created by the Lee group and served as the most proper remedy for putting it under control. No one can have a bargain on it as it is a declaration with legal validity issued by the prestigious organization of the DPRK. A document with legal validity can never be overturned once it is adopted.
					
					 The Lee group is working hard to play down the weight of the statement in a desperate effort to evade the responsibility for having pushed the inter-Korean relations to collapse. This is little short of adding to the crimes committed by it against reunification.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Treachery Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Treachery Flailed
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson in a signed commentary today condemns Lee Myung Bak of south Korea for turning the "Ministry of Unification" into a ministry for confrontation.
					 Recently mandarins of the "Ministry of Unification" sponsored the 2nd "co-existence, co-prosperity forum" under the pretext of achieving "understanding" among people. At the forum they justified Lee Myung Bak's "policy towards the north" and made such provocative remarks as "those abducted by the north" and "POWs of the south Korean army" as part of the smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 This anti-DPRK smear campaign is, in a nutshell, intended to stamp out the people's desire for national reunification through alliance with the north and stoke among them the consciousness of confrontation with the fellow countrymen, the commentary points out, and says:
					
					 The anti-reunification nature of the "ministry" was also proven by a document it sent, through the "Institute for Unification Education" under it, to the "Council of Unification Education," a non-governmental organization.
					
					 In the document the "ministry" urged the council to adjust organizations affiliated to it and drastically reduce the size of its board of directors and joint presidium and reform its jury and secretariat. This means calling for replacement of progressive and reformist organizations with ultra-right conservative ones as well as involvement in the council of coteries serving the "ministry."
					
					 Not content with such demand, it forced the council to conduct its activities with permission from the "Institute for Unification Education" whose head is So Jae Jin, an ill-famed anti-DPRK confrontational maniac.
					
					 In fact the "ministry" can be said to be a ministry for confrontation as it seeks to escalate the moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen after putting even the said non-governmental organization under its control.
					
					 If Hyon In Thaek, one of the notorious anti-DPRK confrontational fanatics, is allowed to hold the top post of the "ministry," it will be turned into a ministry inciting confrontation without doubt.
					
					 It is no doubt that the north-south relations will go to total collapse and the situation grow more acute in such case.
					
					 By turning the "Ministry of Unification" into a ministry for confrontation, Lee Myung Bak is treading in the shameful track of Kim Young Sam who had never had a chance for north-south dialogue during his tenure. Clear is what a miserable fate traitor Lee will meet.

articles.title: Superior Election System of DPRK
articles.content:
Superior Election System of DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The election of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly is to be held in the DPRK on March 8.
					 This election system in the DPRK makes it possible for the working people to truly participate in the formation of the state power.
					
					 The superiority of the election system finds manifestation in that the election is held in a free and fair atmosphere by secret vote on the principles of general, equal and direct election.
					
					 On the principle of general election, all the citizens above the age of 17  can  take part in the elections of deputies to the people's assemblies at all levels and be elected, irrespective of sex, nationality, occupation, period of residence, property status, standards of learning, party affiliation, political view and religious belief. Only those who are deprived of the right to election by the decision of a court and mentally deranged persons are denied the right to elect and be elected.
					
					 The principle of equal voting enables all the voters to elect and be elected with the same qualification and right. It allows no difference in the weight and efficiency of the ballot.
					
					 On the principle of direct election, the voter casts his or her ballot directly to a candidate for deputy. It, unlike indirect voting, makes it possible to convey the will of the voters directly to the deputies to make the people's power bodies democratic power bodies representing the will of all the voters.
					
					 This principle is guaranteed by practical measures such as strictly banning voting by proxy, installing special sub-constituencies at hospitals, sanatoria, major railway stations and other places, organizing itinerant voting for citizens unable to come to the voting booths and declaring the election day a holiday.
					
					 Secret ballot enables the voters to express their free will on the candidates without any restriction.  It guarantees a fair and aboveboard election by letting every voter express his or her will freely without subject to coercion, surveillance or threat by anyone.
					
					 These principles of election in the DPRK are ones embodying socialist democracy, democracy of the highest form, which make it possible to firmly build up the power bodies at all levels with fine representatives of the working class and working people of other strata, make the power bodies direct spokespersons of the will of the popular masses and stand the popular masses as the genuine masters of power.
					
					 Now the entire army and people are full of enthusiasm to powerfully demonstrate once again the might of single-minded unity in the DPRK and fortify the people's power like a monolith by taking part in the election as one man.

articles.title: Punishment of Mastermind of Ryongsan Incident Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Mastermind of Ryongsan Incident Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 10 to demand the detention and punishment of the mastermind of killing evacuees in Ryongsan.
					At the conference the organization termed the resignation of Kim Sok Gi, chief of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency, hypocritical, adding that this was done according to the scenario of "Chongwadae" to shift the responsibility for the tragedy in Ryongsan onto the evacuees and calm down the popular resentment at the murder.
					
					 On the same day the bereaved families of the dead also denounced Kim Sok Gi's resignation farce.
					
					 Meanwhile, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions made public a statement on Feb. 9 in which it condemned the puppet prosecution authorities for their behavior of falsifying the truth behind the killing of evacuees.
					
					 Accusing the prosecution of becoming an accomplice of the police and the present regime in killing people, defying truth, the statement deplored that this would spark off a tragedy similar to what happened in Ryongsan in the days ahead.
					
					 It warned that the people will never pardon the Lee Myung Bak regime as they are infuriated by its reckless action to cover up the tragedy in Ryongsan.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand and Measures Supported in Indonesia
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand and Measures Supported in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- We wish the Korean party, government and people bigger success in the drive to implement the tasks set forth in the joint New Year editorial under the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Megawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, said this when meeting the DPRK ambassador to Indonesia on Feb. 6.
					
					 She expressed belief that the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation would be surely opened in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 She also expressed support for the stand and measures taken by the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to defend and implement the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand Hailed in Czech Republic
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand Hailed in Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea fully supported the statements issued by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army and the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					 The organizations in their joint statement on Feb. 5 said that the situation is getting tenser day by day on the Korean Peninsula where the atmosphere of national reconciliation and unity had been prevalent and this is arousing serious concern from among the international community aspiring after Korea's reunification.
					
					 They bitterly denounced the Lee Myung Bak group's policy of confrontation with the DPRK and expressed full support for the statements of a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army and the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea that clarified the DPRK's principled stand to crush such policy.
					
					 They strongly urged the south Korean authorities to stop the military provocative moves against the DPRK at once, respect the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and make a radical switchover in their policy for Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno fabricas en ciudad de Wonsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno fabricas en ciudad de Wonsan
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno las fabricas en la ciudad de Wonsan.
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del  Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Kangwon Ri Chol Bong, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC Pak Nam Gi y el consejero del CDN de la RPDC Pak Myong Chol.
					
					En el mismo terreno, el Dirigente fue acogido por el secretario del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Kangwon Pak Jong Nam, el presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Wonsan Ri Il Sop y los funcionarios directivos de la fabrica.
					
					Primeramente, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Botellas de Vidrio de Wonsan.
					
					Luego de escuchar el historial de la fabrica en la sala de presentacion del historial hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de renovacion tecnica y el estado de produccion recorriendo los procesos de produccion  incluyendo el equipo de elaboracion.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que en pleno acato a la orientacion del PTC de hacer la revolucion en la industria ligera, los obreros de la fabrica    modernizaron en un corto plazo de tiempo el proceso de produccion de botellas de vidrio al introducir activamente la tecnica avanzada y asi producen gran cantidad  de los  productos de vidrio.
					
					Senalo que la fabrica echo con sus propias fuerzas la firme base material y tecnica y aumento sin cesar la produccion apoyandose en los materiales locales y anadio que las experiencias de esta fabrica prueban una vez mas la verdad de que al materializar estrictamente en la labor y la vida la consigna del partido "!Solo la autoconfianza es la via para sobrevivir!" se registra el gigantesco salto en la produccion y la construccion.
					
					Diciendo que esta fabrica reviste suma importancia en la mejora de la vida del pueblo provincial,  presento las tareas  que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					Recalco que la fabrica debe prestar la primordial atencion a aumentar  las variedades de los articulos y subrayo que hay que producir las botellas de varios usos y los utensilios domesticos.
					
					Destaco que hay que seguir impulsando energicamente la modernizacion y cientifizacion de la fabrica, introducir activamente nuevas tecnicas y elevar incesantemente el nivel de tecnica y habilidad de los obreros.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente realizo una visita de orientacion a la Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige Universidad de Agricultura de Wonsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige Universidad de Agricultura de Wonsan
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Universidad de Agricultura de Wonsan.
					Guiado por el rector de la Universidad, recorrio la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Al recordar con gran emocion la orgullosa trayectoria del plantel docente, senalo que este plantel de agronomia del pueblo fundada por primera vez en la historia de nuestra patria por la iniciativa y bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung se convirtio hoy en una fidedigna base de formacion de los agronomos del pais.
					
					Evaluo altamente los meritos del Instituto universitario subrayando que este centro docente de larga historia contribuyo muchisimo al desarrollo de la agricultura del pais al formar durante mas de 60 anos a numerosos cientificos y tecnicos competentes incluyendo a los academicos, candidatos al academico, doctores, especialistas en la agricultura.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente estuvo en la exhibicion de exitos docentes y cientificos y la de proyectos ingeniosos.
					
					Pasando revista a los objetos exhibidos, se cercioro en detalles de los exitos alcanzados en las labores para el desarrollo de la educacion y la investigacion cientifica y se mostro muy satisfecho de que los profesores, empleados y estudiantes hicieron muchas cosas para el desarrollo agricola del pais.
					
					Luego de encomiar el original acondicionamiento de la exhibicion de proyectos ingeniosos, subrayo la necesidad de intensificar la cooperacion creativa entre los cientificos, los tecnicos y los productores para desarrollar de modo incesante la ciencia y la tecnica mediante proyectos ingeniosos, iniciativas activas y materializacion audaz e introducir a tiempo en la produccion los exitos logrados en la investigacion cientifica y las innovaciones tecnicas.
					
					A continuacion, paso por diversos lugares de la Universidad donde evaluo altamente el hecho de que fueron bien acondicionadas las bases de ensayo y practica para dar los conocimientos aplicables en la realidad a los estudiantes combinando estrechamente la leccion, el ensayo cientifico y la practica de produccion y, sobre todo, fue dado un magnifico clima docente mediante la forestacion y otras labores.
					
					Al destacar que la Universidad juega importante papel en el desarrollo agricola del pais, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la ensenanza y la investigacion cientifica.
					
					Subrayo que los profesores y empleados del centro docente deben tener presente siempre el proposito del partido de situar nuestra ciencia y tecnica en el nivel mundial en un corto tiempo y formar a talentosos cientificos y tecnicos al mejorar y fortalecer sin cesar la labor docente conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo.
					
					Recalco que este plantel debe formar en un corto tiempo a mas cientificos y tecnicos calificados para solucionar los problemas apremiantes que se presentan en la materializacion de la orientacion del partido de dar prioridad a la agricultura y contribuir activamente al desarrollo trascendental de la ciencia y tecnica agricolas generales del pais al explorar ampliamente nuevos dominios cientificos y tecnicos que tienen gran importancia para la implementacion de la demanda de los autoctonos metodos de cultivo.
					
					Destaco que se debe colocar la bandera de la victoria en la cumbre de la gran potencia prospera y manifestar a todo el mundo la dignidad de la Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar) con las fuerzas de ciencia y tecnica.
					
					Dispenso gran amor y benevolencias recalcando que para registrar un nuevo viraje en la formacion de los agronomos, hay que garantizar en lo suficiente las condiciones necesarias a la ensenanza y a la investigacion cientifica y prestar profunda atencion a la vida de los profesores, empleados y estudiantes.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Kangwon, Ri Chol Bong, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi, y el consejero del CDN de la RPDC, Pak Myong Chol.

articles.title: CRPP rechaza interrupcion total del intercambio N-S en dominio de prensa
articles.content:
CRPP rechaza interrupcion total del intercambio N-S en dominio de prensa
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el "Ministerio de Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea interrumpio totalmente el intercambio de articulos con el Norte, que propuso la direccion de prensa del Comite Sureno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, pretextando "garantizar la seguridad". 
					Al respecto, el secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica este viernes la informacion No. 945 cuyo texto resumido sigue abajo:
					
					El ano pasado, partiendo del noble proposito de fomentar la comprension reciproca entre el Norte y el Sur y adelantar la reconciliacion, la cooperacion y la reunificacion, la subcomision de la prensa del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio acordo oficialmente con su contraparte surcoreana realizar el intercambio de articulos.
					
					  Este acuerdo sumamente natural no debe ser criminalizado de ninguna manera tanto en vista de la corriente de la historia nacional, que marcha hacia la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad bajo la bandera del ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", como a la luz del elevado entusiasmo de los compatriotas por la reunificacion.
					
					 Sin embargo, bajo el pretexto de la supuesta "seguridad" y "preocupacion" las autoridades surcoreanas cometieron la fechoria fascista de desautorizar el intercambio intercoreano en el terreno de la prensa.
					
					 Esta locura anti-reunificacion partio de la malsana intencion de eliminar entre los habitantes surcoreanos la conciencia de reunificar el pais en alianza con el Norte, sembrar la hostilidad a los connacionales y romper completamente las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					 La "preocupacion", de que habla la banda de Lee, significa el temor a que se transmitan a los surcoreanos las voces de los norcoreanos aspirantes a la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y la reunificacion independiente.
					
					 Y la supuesta "seguridad" insinua que esa horda trata de fortalecer los aparatos legales e institucionales anti-reunificacion y para la confrontacion fratricida y el sistema de dominacion fascista.
					
					  La banda de Lee debe ver correctamente la tendencia actual, revocar la medida de interrumpir el intercambio de los articulos entre las entidades de prensa del Norte y el Sur y renunciar de inmediato su politica de enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Condenan campana de represion contra entidad juvenil surcoreana
articles.content:
Condenan campana de represion contra entidad juvenil surcoreana
  Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ATCC) -- En su declaracion fechada 12, el portavoz de la subcomision de estudiantes y jovenes del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio califico la campana represora lanzada por la banda de Lee Myung Bak contra el "Consejo de Organizaciones Juveniles del Sur de Corea" (COJSC), entidad patriotica pro-reunificacion del Sur de Corea, de imperdonable crimen antinacional y anti-reunificacion para suprimir totalmente las justas actividades patrioticas pro-reunificacion de los jovenes y estudiantes.
					 Al tildar de "entidad pro-enemiga" al COJSC acusando sus justas actividades de los absurdos cargos como "moverse segun la indicacion trasera", "elogiar, estimular, propagar y marcar los pasos" con alguien, la banda de Lee volvio a mostrar su naturaleza de connotado opositor a la reunificacion y dictador fascista, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					 Es muy natural que los habitantes de diferentes sectores del Sur de Corea se levantaran en la lucha por la retirada del "poder" de Lee criticandolo como "regimen anti-reunificacion que invento nueva  a los 12 anos desde que fue calificada asi la Federacion de Consejos Generales de Estudiantes Universitarios del Sur de Corea" y tildando de "accion pro-enemiga mas grande" la negacion a las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.
					
					 Dejando intacta a esa horda de traidores que lleva a la peor situacion las relaciones intercoreanas con su politica de confrontacion fratricida como "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3000 dolares" y trata de acabar con la justicia y el patriotismo esgrimiendo el sable de fascismo y dictadura, no se puede pensar en el presente y el futuro de los jovenes y estudiantes surcoreanos ni lograr la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					 Los jovenes y estudiantes del Norte enviaran su invariable apoyo y respaldo a sus colegas surcoreanos alzados a la lucha por la independencia antiyanqui y contra Lee Myung Bak y estaran siempre junto con ellos en la batalla de vida o muerte por barrer a la camarilla encabezada por este.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena acto criminal del traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena acto criminal del traidor Lee Myung Bak
						
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual del dia 13, el periodico Minju Joson condena al traidor Lee Myung Bak quien trata de convertir el "Ministerio de Reunificacion" en el "ministerio de enfrentamiento".
					  En el segundo "Forum de convivencia y coprosperidad" efectuado recientemente, los agentes del "Ministerio de Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea justificaron la "politica sobre el Norte de Corea" elaborada por Lee so pretexto de la "comunicacion con los pobladores" y se refirieron a llamadas "personas secuestradas por el Norte" y "prisioneros del ejercito de defensa nacional".
					
					  Este alboroto de enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea parte del objeto de suprimir la aspiracion de los surcoreanos a reunificar el pais en alianza con el Norte e inculcar a estos la conciencia de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					  Asi senalo el comentarista y continuo:
					
					  Lo confirma el documento enviado por ese "ministerio" a la organizacion civil "Consejo de Educacion de Reunificacion" por medio del "Instituto de Educacion de Reunificacion", que es entidad bajo su egida.
					
					  A fin de sustituir las entidades progresistas y reformistas por otras conservadoras ultraderechistas el "Ministerio de Reunificacion" ordeno al citado "consejo" arreglar las entidades afiliadas. Tambien, con el fin de meter sus lacayos demando reducir en gran medida el tamano del consejo y la copresidencia y reformar el comite de revision y el secretariado.
					
					  No satisfecho de esto, el "Ministerio de Reunificacion" obligo al "Consejo de Educacion de Reunificacion" que libre las actividades bajo el permiso del "Instituto" arriba mencionado, cuyo presidente es So Jae Jin, reconocido como maniaco de enfrentamiento con la RPDC.
					
					  El "Ministerio de Reunificacion", que trata de fortalecer las maniobras de enfrentamiento fratricida tomando en su mano hasta el "Consejo de Educacion de Reunificacion", es el "ministerio de confrontacion".
					
					  Si Hyon In Thaek, reconocido como maniaco de enfrentamiento con la RPDC, toma el cargo del ministro, el "Ministro de Reunificacion" sera convertido, al pie de letras, en el "ministerio de confrontacion".
					
					  En ese caso, se cancelaran por completo las relaciones Norte-Sur y se tornara mas grave la situacion.
					
					  En fin de cuentas, el traidor Lee repite el destino vergonzoso del traidor Kim Young Sam quien no pudo hacer ningun dialogo con el Norte durante todo su mandato. Jamas podra evitar la autodestruccion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exige sacar lecciones de conflictos internacionales
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exige sacar lecciones de conflictos internacionales
						
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ATCC) -- Un litigio puede ser solucionado satisfactoriamente solo cuando las partes responsables opten por la via pacifica mediante el dialogo y las negociaciones conforme a los propios intereses nacionales y a la causa de la paz mundial.
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 13 y continua:
					
					  La primera causa de los litigios reside en la injusta idea y politica de los imperialistas y dominacionistas que persiguen solo sus intereses despreciando a otros paises y naciones y perjudicando los intereses de estos.
					
					  En los ultimos anos, en los paises, que dependian de las potencias occidentales y aceptaron la injusta demanda de estas, fue creada una grave situacion matizada por las contradicciones y conflictos ensangrentados entre las sectas partidistas y religiosas.
					
					  La realidad ensena a los pueblos en litigios la leccion de que para solucionarlos, no deben apoyarse en las potencias occidentales sino buscar entre las partes responsables los principios y metodos correctos.
					
					  No se debe permitir que fueran escuchadas solo las voces de algunas fuerzas privilegiadas y despreciadas las demandas de las partes involucradas en el litigio. En particular, hay que impedir la imprudente sancion y la intervencion con las fuerzas armadas.
					
					  Algunas fuerzas tratan de gestionar a sus caprichos los litigios considerandolos como oportunidad para satisfacer sus intereses.
					
					 Hasta la fecha, no fueron pocos los casos de que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU fue utilizado para los intereses de unos Estados privilegiados a la hora de abordar los litigios internacionales.
					
					 Como resultado, fueron despreciados los reconocidos principios importantes de las relaciones internacionales, incluyendo el respeto a la soberania y la no intervencion en los asuntos internos.
					
					  Bajo el pretexto de la "solucion de litigios", se reportaron casos anormales como la aplicacion de la sancion y la presion contra los Estados soberanos y el tratamiento frecuente de los problemas que estan fuera de la autoridad del Consejo de Seguridad.
					
					  Este organismo debe cumplir satisfactoriamente su funcion y papel como organo responsable de la ONU, a cargo de garantizar realmente la paz y seguridad internacionales y la solucion de los conflictos, y no debe utilizarse como aparato para legalizar la realizacion de los intereses estrategicos de unos Estados privilegiados.
					
					  Hay que rechazar consecuentemente las medidas coercitivas como la sancion y el uso de las fuerzas armadas, que producen solo el empeoramiento de los litigios. 
					
					Para este fin, es necesario establecer un regimen en que las resoluciones del CS tengan vigencia solo con la aprobacion de la Asamblea General.
